Name: SYS_TIMESTAMP
Label: Timestamp
Description: Current unix timestamp

Name: SYS_REGMAP_VERSION
Label: Register map version
Description:
Version of register map in format xxxyyy.
Xxx - major version of register map.
Yyy - minor version of register map.
Major version defines compatibility of different register maps. If major version of register map changes, the values previously stored in the flash memory are discarded and factory values are used

Name: SYS_CPU_USAGE
Label: CPU usage
Description: CPU usage in percent (measures proportion of time spent in idle task, which may be inaccurate in case of IRQ handlers)

Name: SYS_CPU_TEMPER
Label: CPU temperature
Description: CPU temperature

Name: SYS_PASSWORD_HASH
Label: Password hash
Description:
Hash of the stored password
Meaning of respective bits:

Name: SYS_TEST
Label: Testing register
Description: For internal use only

Name: FACT_SERIAL_NUMBER
Label: Serial number
Description:
Serial number of product with common device ID in format xxyyzzzz.
Xx - year of production
Yy - month of production
zzzz - serial incremental number of the product

Name: FACT_DEVICE_ID
Label: Product number
Description: Product family identification. PM6000 series has device id equal to 6000.

Name: FACT_HW_REVISION
Label: Hardware version
Description:
Hardware revision of the device defined as xx00yyzz:
xx - Bootstrap pins that defines version of MCU-compatible firmwares (0 for current version)
00 - reserved for future use
yy - year of production
zz - month of production

Name: FACT_BOOT_REVISION
Label: Bootloader version
Description:
Firmware revision of the bootloader as number xxxyyy:
xxx - major version of bootloader
yyy - minor version of bootloader

Name: FIRM_REVISION
Label: Firmware version
Description: Firmware revision of the current application image as an incremental number. See list of FW revision or release notes for respective features.

Name: FIRM_ASSEMBLY_INFO
Label: Assembly date
Description:
Assembly information of the current application in format xxxxyyzz:
xxxx - year of FW build
yy - month of FW build
zz - day of FW build

Name: FIRM_APP_CHECKSUM
Label: CRC checksum
Description: CRC checksum of the current application

Name: FIRM_APP_SIZE
Label: Firmware size
Description: Firmware size of the current application in bytes

Name: COM_LOGIN_RESULT
Label: Login result
Description:
Result of login attempt - current user login access rigths
Allowed values: 
No user is logged in - No user is logged in.
Login attempt has failed - Login attempt has failed.
Normal user has logged in - Normal user has logged in.
Super user has logged in - Super user has logged in.

Name: COM_MB_BAUD_RATE
Label: Modbus baud rate
Description:
Modbus RTU serial port baud rate
Allowed values: 
9600 - 9600 baud/s.
19200 - 19200 baud/s.
38400 - 38400 baud/s.
57600 - 57600 baud/s.
115200 - 115200 baud/s.

Name: COM_MB_PARITY
Label: Modbus parity
Description:
Modbus RTU serial port parity
Allowed values: 
NONE parity - NONE parity.
EVEN parity - EVEN parity.
ODD parity - ODD parity.

Name: COM_MB_STOP_BITS
Label: Modbus stop bits
Description:
Modbus RTU serial port - number of stop bits
Allowed values: 
1 stop bit - 1 stop bit.
2 stop bits - 2 stop bits.

Name: COM_MB_ADDRESS
Label: Modbus slave address
Description: Modbus RTU serial port slave address

Name: REGU_RESULT
Label: Result of InputA plus Offset times multiplier

Name: REGU_STATUS
Label: Status register
Description:
Set of multiple status bits.

These bits are common for the entire device
Meaning of respective bits: 
General error - General error - sum of all errors.
Modbus timeout - Communication Modbus timeout.
Device is busy - Device is busy doing something else.
General warning - General warning - sum of multiple warnings.

Name: REGU_DUMMY
Label: Dummy variable
Description: Blah blah blah
